attributes.action: Take France off the Amber Plus list with no quarantine for the fully vaccinated
attributes.additional_details: The current 10 day quarantine is stopping people being able to see family, attend weddings, go to funerals of loved ones, as well as the huge cost associated with doing so!
attributes.background: Allow anyone that has been fully vaccinated to travel from France to the UK with no quarantine - following the same rules as other amber list countries.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592771
